chatbot.errorMessage: I'm sorry, I'm not able to do that yet. If you want to try some other options please refresh the page.

seekHelp.hello1: Hello, I’m Lilo! This is a safe and anonymous space and I’m here to help you.
seekHelp.hello2: You can ask me anything, pick a topic below or do the Crime Preliminary Assessment with me.

preliminary.text: Answer a few quick questions to narrow down on the specific crime and get tailored recommended help

crime.text: I don’t know what to do

seekHelp.crime: A crime has happened and I don't know what to do

preliminary.hello1: Hello, I’m Lilo! This is a safe and anonymous space and I’m here to guide you through this.
preliminary.hello2: There will be a series of questions where you can either pick an option or type your message in.
preliminary.hello3: At the end, there will be a list of all the possible crimes that may apply and you can export it and save it as a pdf.

information.hello1: Hello, I’m Lilo! This is a safe and anonymous space and I’m here to help you.
information.hello2: You can ask me anything, pick a topic below or do the Crime Preliminary Assessment with me.

preliminary.text: Answer a few quick questions to narrow down on the specific crime and get tailored recommended help

information.forward: Alright, I'll forward you to an information page about that topic. If you need me again, I'll be here.
